value:
On warm days like this, nothing beats
hopping on a pegasus and feeling the
wind on your face! Wanna join me?

Look at all those smiling people! You
can feel the warmth in their hearts.
That's how you know winter's over.

Palla and Catria already celebrated
the spring festival. But this time, all
three of us can have fun together!

Hehe, isn't this outfit cute?
I wonder what Abel will think...

Hippity-hop! Look at me, I'm a rabbit!
My sisters won't hop around with me,
but if they did we'd be soooo cute!

The spring festival is happening!
This is your official reminder from
$Nf! Hop to it!
Wow, look at that! Spring HAS sprung!
I can hop even higher, I just know it!

Maybe I got a bit carried away at
the festival...

Ooh! A spring festival present?
I love it!

I'm Est! My two older sisters already
got to enjoy the spring festival. Now
it's my turn. You can't stop me!

I LOVE springtime! It's a refreshing
restart where anything's possible!$k$pLike new friends, adventures, recipes,
and even a new me!$k$pI know I should focus on fighting,
but when the battles are finally over...
I hope every day will be this carefree.$k$pAll we need to do is push through
winter, and our spring is bound to
be there waiting... For all of us!$k$pIf we do our best, I know it'll happen!
Count on my sisters and me to have
your back, $Nu!
たあっ
いくわよ！
うっ…
そんなあ…！
Spring is here!
Bunny time!
Lovely weather, isn't it?
Flowers everywhere!
Too much fun...
Boing!
Hippity-hey there! I'm Est! Hoppy to meet you.
Don't mess up my ears. This bunny has fangs!
A celebration where people dress up as bunnies is...a little weird—but it's also really fun!
Seeing my sisters working hard makes me want to follow in their footsteps!
I didn't think I'd be the bunny type...but I'm having fun hopping around anyway!
Why did the bunny cross the road? ...To get to the carrot farm, of course!
Hey—how come you haven't put on your bunny costume yet? Hurry up!
Nice!
*yawn*
Hop, hop!
